si.title: උල්ම් යනු සිංහල බෞද්ධ ජනතාවගේ ජයග්රාහකයා ය. බාරුක්Imtiaz pkir makar
body_lines: வடக்கிலிருந்து முஸ்லிம் மக்கள் வெளியேற்றப்பட்ட போது அந்த மக்களுக்கு உதவி ஒத்தாசைகளை வழங்குவதற்காக எம்முடன் முன்னின்று செயற்பட்டவர் யூ.எல்.எம். බාර්ටන්. ඒ හා සමානව, ඉම්ටියාස් පකර් මකාර් පැවසුවේ සිංහල බෞද්ධ ජනතාවගේ ජයග්රාහකයා බවයි.
හිටපු අමාත්ය අමරා ගාමිනි ජයවික්රම පෙරේරා සහ හිටපු රාජ්ය අමාත්ය. L. එම්.

Ulm. මුලදී සමස්ත ලංකා මුස්ලිම් ලීග් යෞවන ජ්යෙෂ් senior යාගේ ජ්යෙෂ් Senior උප සභාපති බාරුක් මහතා අප සමඟ ආරම්භයේ දී. குறிப்பாக வடக்கிலிருந்து முஸ்லிம் மக்கள் விடுதலை புலிகளால் வெளியேற்றப்பட்டபோது, அவர்கள் தங்கி இருப்பதற்கு வீட்டு வசதிகள் உள்ளிட்ட அடிப்படை வசதிகளை ஏற்படுத்திக்கொடுக்க பாரிய முயற்சிகளை மேற்கொண்டார்.
කෙගල්ල දිස්ත්රික්කයෙන් පාර්ලිමේන්තු මන්ත්රීවරයකු වීමට ඔහුට අවස්ථාව ලැබුණි. මන්ද එම අවස්ථාව එක්සත් ජාතික පක්ෂයේ අභ්යන්තර ප්රජාතන්ත්රවාදය විදහා දැක්වීමට දවසක් විය.

රංජන් විජරත්න එක්සත් ජාතීන්ගේ ලේකම්වරයා වූ විට ඔහු යෝජනාවක් ගෙන ආවේ පක්ෂ සංවිධායකවරයාට රික්තයක් තිබුනේ නම්, නියාමනය එක්සත් ජාතික පක්ෂයේ තරුණ කාන්තා සංවිධානයේ ඡන්දයෙන් ඡන්දය ප්රකාශ කිරීමේ ඡන්දයෙන් පිරී තිබේ.

அந்த பிரேரணையின் நிறைவேற்றப்பட்ட பின்னர் முதலாவதாக அந்த தீர்மானத்தை செயற்படுத்தியது ருவன்வெல்ல தொகுதியாகும். පාර්ලිමේන්තු මන්ත්රී ධුරයෙන් ඉල්ලා අස් කොට ආණ්ඩුකාර ධුරය එම ස්ථානයට පුරවා ගැනීම සඳහා ආණ්ඩුකාර ධුරයට පත් කළ එක්සත් ජාතීන්ගේ රුවන් රුවින්වෙල්ලා ඡන්ද කයුන්ත්රික සංවිධායක බී.. U.l.m.. பாரூக்கும் பிரேரிக்கப்பட்டனர்.

රුවන්වැල්ල ඡන්ද කොට් constituency ාශයේ තරුණ හා කාන්තා සංවිධානයේ ඡන්දය ප්රකාශ කිරීම සඳහා යූ.එල්.එම්.එම්. බාරුක් තෝරා ගන්නා ලදී. මුස්ලිම් ජනගහනයෙන් සියයට එකකටත් වඩා අඩු එම ඡන්ද කොට් constituency ාශයෙන් යූ.එම. ෆාරූක්ගේ තේරීම වන්නේ ඔහු සිංහලයන් සමඟ ඉතා පිටසක්වල ජීවියෙකු වීමයි.

en.title: ULM is the winner of the Sinhala Buddhist people. BaruchImtiaz Pakir Makar
body_lines: When the Muslim people were expelled from the North, the ULM was the one who worked with us to provide assistance to the people.. Bartain. Similarly, Imtiaz Pakir Makar said he was the winner of the Sinhala Buddhist people.

Former Minister Amara Gamini Jayawickrama Perera and former Minister of State for Parliament. L. M. Barooq and Member of Parliament Amara Ashoka Jayawardena said this while addressing the sympathy proposal.

ULM. Baruch was the senior vice president of the All Ceylon Muslim League Youth Front with us at the beginning. In particular, when the Muslim people were expelled from the North, he made huge efforts to provide basic amenities, including housing, to stay.
And he had the opportunity to become a Member of Parliament from Kegalle District. Because that opportunity was a day to showcase the internal democracy of the United National Party.

When Ranjan Wijeratne was the UNP secretary, he had brought a proposal that if the party organizer had a vacuum, the void would be filled with the votes of the United National Party's Young Women Organization in the constituency.

After the passage of the proposal, the resolution was first implemented by the Ruwanwella constituency. UNP Ruwenwella constituency organizer B, PC, who resigned from the post of MP and appointed Governor to fill the vacuum to the place.. U.L.M.. Barruk was also proposed.

U.LMM in the Voting of the Youth and Women Organization of the Ruwanwella constituency. Baruch was chosen. U.LM from that constituency that is less than one percent of the Muslim population. Farooq's choice is due to the fact that he was very alien with the Sinhalese.

summary_lines: ULM, led by BaruchImtiaz Pakir Makar, aided Muslim expellees from the North, showcasing unity with the Sinhala Buddhist people. Former ministers and MPs highlighted ULM's efforts, with Baruch's significant contributions in providing basic amenities. Despite being a minority, ULM's Baruch was elected to Parliament from Kegalle District, demonstrating the UNP's internal democracy. This election, influenced by the UNP's Young Women Organization's votes, saw Baruch's selection, reflecting his integration and acceptance within the Sinhalese community.
